command.library
Class CommandFactory

java.lang.Object
  command.library.CommandFactory

public class CommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The factory is responsible to create an object of every command supported and to add it to the list of known commands. New commands must be added to the list of known commands here.

Constructor Summary
CommandFactory(Drive drive)
          Constructor; creates all known commands and adds them to the list of supported commands.
 
Method Summary
 java.util.ArrayList<Command> getCommandList()
          Returns the list of known commands.
 java.lang.String getHelpForCommand(java.lang.String commandName)
          Gibt für das entsprechende Kommand den Helptext zurück.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

CommandFactory

public CommandFactory(Drive drive)
Constructor; creates all known commands and adds them to the list of supported commands.

Parameters:
drive - reference to the drive, the commands operate on.
Method Detail

getCommandList

public java.util.ArrayList<Command> getCommandList()
Returns the list of known commands. Is called at configuration time to transfer the supported commands to the invoker.

Returns:
list of known commands.

getHelpForCommand

public java.lang.String getHelpForCommand(java.lang.String commandName)
Gibt für das entsprechende Kommand den Helptext zurück.

Parameters:
commandName - Commandname
Returns:
Text oder null, wenn kein Hilfetext existiert
